sub_title: Microsoft 365 Adoption Consultant & People Manager at ShareValue B.V.
summary:
I am an experienced Microsoft 365 adoption consultant. Having significant experience doing analyses, performing quick scans and advice how to implement Microsoft 365 solutions. I'm a really big fan of Microsoft Teams and love to motivate people on digital collaboration.

My areas of interest are change and people management. I like to be challenged by analytical complex issues. When problem solving these issues I always try to have the commitment and acceptance of the whole organization. An enthusiastic team player, result driven and able to work independently. I enjoy working with many different people in various environments.

education.field_of_study: Marketing & Sales (Nima A, Nima B, NIMA Sales-A, Nemas Middle Management)

courses.name: SharePoint 2013 Site Collection and Site Administration (55033)

profile_positions.description: It is fun working as a consultant at ShareValue. We have a great team of specialists with Azure, Dynamics 365, Front-End development, Microsoft .NET and Microsoft 365 knowledge and always looking for new challenging assignments in different environments. If you want to join us or have an assignment to discuss, don't hesitate to contact us!
profile_positions.title: Microsoft 365 Adoption Consultant

profile_positions.description: I love to motivate, inspire and challenge people to take themselves one step further. Attention for the individual, but also for the team and ShareValue. My team includes Azure Engineers and functional Microsoft 365 consultants.
profile_positions.title: People Manager

profile_positions.description: ShareValue has a great consultants team and we are always interested in new colleagues who are active with SharePoint and Office 365. Are you interested or do you know someone who matches, let me know and we will drink some coffee (or something else :-)) together.
profile_positions.title: Office 365 Teammanager

profile_positions.description: Advised several customers (De Digitale Adviseur, Stichting OOG, DataBase Fulfilment) about system design (structure, permissions), use of SharePoint (lists, knowledge sharing opportunities, overview pages including web parts) and she has also written functional designs.
profile_positions.title: SharePoint Consultant, SharePoint 2010 and Office 365

profile_positions.description: Responsible for setting up the operational management including a number of processes within Office 365. Translated the requirements into a functional working environment by implementing a Teamsite Portal with multiple subsites, taking into account the constraints within the Office 365 subscription. Also migrated the content into SharePoint Online and trained the end users.
profile_positions.title: SharePoint Consultant, Implementation Office 365

profile_positions.description: Exchange Online, Office Pro Plus, OneDrive and Teams are implemented as part of Office 365. Responsible for setting up the Office 365 management organization, delivering governance agreements and setting up the roadmap management process. Also managed the floorwalk team which answered user questions during the transition phase from the program to the servicedesk.
profile_positions.title: Project manager Governance & Beheer / O365 Consultant

profile_positions.description: Responsible for managing the adoption team and reporting to management. In addition to guiding (project) teams, departments and users during Office 365 user adoption trajectories, linking pin to the migration team to ensure that both processes are properly aligned.
profile_positions.title: Office 365 Adoption Consultant and Teamlead

profile_positions.description: The Expert Center Online team is corporate key contact for all Office 365 related issues within Dutch Railways. Collaboration is facilitated by implementing Office 365 enterprise wide. I was responsible for gathering requirements, handling requests for advice and setting up site collections based on site templates and governance which was developed by the team.
profile_positions.title: Office 365 Consultant

profile_positions.description: CMS is one of the six systems which is built in SharePoint 2007 and is being used at all international Bluewater locations including four FPSO's (vessels). All business processes are stored in the CMS and based on the Plan-Do-Check-Act principle. I looked at the current SharePoint architecture, reviewed the CMS environment, gathered uses wishes and made recommendations. In my role as CMS co-ordinator I was also responsible for setting up four pages which displays specific information applicable to each vessel.
profile_positions.title: CMS Co-ordinator, CMS in SharePoint 2007

profile_positions.description: The intranet is built in SharePoint 2007 and based on a portal vision, where the focus was on collaboration and knowledge sharing. Responsible for guiding the testing phase to the start of production. In my role as functional application manager I supported users with functional questions, adviced on the use of the system, resolved issues, implemented improvements and ensured the documentation was up to date.
profile_positions.title: Functional Application Manager, Intranet Portal in SharePoint 2007

profile_positions.description: EnzaPlaza (intranet) and Team Sites are implemented in SharePoint 2010 as an enterprise (worldwide) solution. Responsible for setting up training including materials like presentations and Quick Reference Cards for different audiciences. Also set up a support site where users can view and download the materials to support their daily work and tested the customized design of EnzaPlaza.
profile_positions.title: Trainer and Tester, EnzaPlaza in SharePoint 2010

profile_positions.description: I have worked on various projects for different clients such as Shell, Nationale Nederlanden, OGA, Rijkswaterstaat, Heineken, but also several internal projects. Some projects are mentioned on my profile.
profile_positions.title: ECM SharePoint / Livelink Consultant

profile_positions.description: Logicas HR Shared Service Centre needed a Knowledge Portal for information assurance in which each target audience within HR Services has its own generic entrance. After extensive interaction with the business and end users, designed and built this Knowledge Portal in SharePoint 2007. Trained content administrators and key users on the usage of this Portal.
profile_positions.title: Project leader, Knowledge Portal in SharePoint 2007

profile_positions.description: Employee-/Manager Self Service (ESS/MSS) is a digital staff file for 6000 employees, in which almost all HR processes in the organization can be started by workflows. Configuration and implementation of the HR company processes using SharePoint 2007. Linking pin between business users and offshore programmers in Manila. Responsible for planning and testing of the e-forms development and supporting and training end users.
profile_positions.title: Functional ECM Consultant, ESS/MSS in SharePoint 2007

company.name: Shell Global Solutions International BV (via Logica)

profile_positions.description: The MI4PT program within Projects and Technology (P&T) helps 12.000 users worldwide to manage their information and to improve finding information. The SharePoint Site Management Service (SSMS) helps the business to request and configure sites according Governance guidelines of P&T. As Service Manager responsible for setting up the SSMS, creating Governance plan, designing processes, leading an international team (Netherlands, Houston and Bangalore) and as Technical Site Owner assisted the business with designing and configuring their SharePoint sites.
profile_positions.title: Service Manager and Technical Site Owner, SSMS in SharePoint 2010

profile_positions.description: A generic entrance was needed for merging two service desks into one service desk within NN. Made an analysis and a functional design based on interviews. Established a Teamsite with a knowledgebase and a specific department part in SharePoint. Migrated the current solutions into one knowledgebase. Also set up the application support management and trained the end users and administrators.
profile_positions.title: Projectleader, Knowledgebase in SharePoint 2007

profile_positions.description:
Apr 2011 -  Oct 2011: Application Management
Transition from project to the application support environment such as setting up (process) and training the helpdesk. Responsible for the intake and the answering the functional calls to the helpdesk. Some of these calls become an RFC and are the basis of next releases. Discussing the scope with the customer and impact analysis. Also coordinating the supervision and operational activities in regard to a next project.

Apr 2009 - Apr 2011: Implementation
Objective of this project is to develop and rollout a custom made Livelink application called DOCwerker across the entire OGA organization. As lead functional designer responsible for the functional system configuration and development of functional design within a complex document management implementation. Trained 600 end users and administrators within OGA and supported rollout activities.
profile_positions.title: ECM Livelink Consultant, Implementation Livelink ES 9.7.1
